price: ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߙߍ ߟߎ߫ ߡߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߝߐ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
